properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jeso no miantso, ekeo :
Ã”! mba vorio ny ondriny.
Ianao no Mpiandry ka vonjeo
Mba hody ao am-balany.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Katsaho,
Tadiavo ilay very soa ho faty.
Areno fa lavo.
Ianao hanampy azy.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Injao re fa mitaraina,
Sady efa osa fa noratrainay.
Mitady 'la ranon'aina,
Vonjeo aza mba malaina.
Katsaho, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Moa efa vonona ianao
Mba ho mpanompo tsara izao,
Hitady sy hamory koa,
Hikatsaka, hamindra fo.
Katsaho, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tsy ho ela dia ho avy izao
Ilay Mpiandry Tomponao.
'Ndeha hiara-miasa hanavao
Hamonjy izao tontolo izao.
Katsaho, sns.
